attributes.action: petrol/diesel price rises  just before Bank Holidays and school holidays.
attributes.background: Over the last three weeks petrol has risen in my area by as much as 8p per litre and seems to be still rising DAILY not weekly. The fuel price has risen at an alarmingly quick rate when "required" by these companies but falls back VERY slowly when barrel prices drop to suit their profits.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Petrol prices are set by retailers.

You could start a petition asking the Government to reduce or remove fuel duty, or to set a cap on fuel prices, if that is what you would like to see happen.
